text.content:
Tiring Blow

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued].

Bludgeoning

Leg Wound

Crit Effect: The target takes a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.Effect: -5-foot status penalty to your land Speed]{-5-foot status penalty to land Speed} until healed.

Piercing

Spun Around

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] until the end of its next turn.

Slashing

Time Vortex

If this is a spell, normal damage and the target vanishes and reappears [[/r 1d4#rounds]]{1d4 rounds} later. The target can use no actions, and any effects it has with durations do not pass while it's gone.

Bomb or Spell
